New_Haven.Swain\u2013Harrison House: The Swain–Harrison House, also known as Harrison House and Museum or the Harrison–Linsley House, is a historic house museum at 124 West Main Street in Branford, Connecticut. It is a classic example of a Connecticut saltbox structure. The original date of erection was given as 1680 in the house's application for listing on the National Register of Historic Places in 1975.
